  • Blockchain Technology: The marketplace utilizes blockchain to ensure the authenticity and ownership of NFTs. Each transaction is recorded on the blockchain, providing a transparent and immutable record of ownership.
  • Fraud Protection: Advanced fraud detection and prevention systems are in place to safeguard users against potential scams or unauthorized transactions.
  • Secure Payment Processing: Whether using cryptocurrency or traditional payment methods, the platform employs industry-standard security protocols to protect financial information.
  • Smart Contract Audits: The smart contracts underlying the NFT transactions are regularly audited to ensure they function as intended and are free from vulnerabilities.
  • Account Security: Users are encouraged to enable two-factor authentication for added account protection. The platform also employs standard security practices like encrypted passwords and secure session management.
  • Verified Game Integration: Only verified games can integrate with the Mythical Marketplace, ensuring that all NFTs traded on the platform are legitimate in-game assets.
  • Transparent Pricing and Fees: The marketplace provides clear information about pricing and fees, helping users make informed decisions and building trust in the platform.
  • Customer Support: A dedicated support team is available to assist users with any issues or concerns, further enhancing trust in the platform.
  • Regular Updates and Maintenance: The platform undergoes regular updates to address any emerging security concerns and to improve overall performance.

By implementing these security and trust measures, the Mythical Marketplace aims to create a safe environment for NFT trading, addressing common concerns associated with digital asset transactions and blockchain technology.

Conclusion

The Mythical Marketplace represents a step forward in the integration of blockchain technology and traditional gaming. By focusing on user-friendly design, lowering barriers to entry, and prioritizing security, it’s making NFT trading accessible to a broader audience of gamers.

Key takeaways:

  • The platform bridges the gap between conventional gaming and blockchain technology.
  • It offers a user-friendly experience, catering to both crypto-savvy users and newcomers.
  • The growing ecosystem of supported games provides diverse opportunities for players to engage with NFTs.
  • Strong security measures and transparency build trust in the platform.

The post What is Mythical Marketplace? Platform for Trading In-Game NFT Assets appeared first on Blockonomi.

item.title: Meet Orderly Network: The Decentralized Liquidity Layer for Web3 Trading
item.dc:creator: Oliver Dale
item.description:
Orderly Network is a DeFi platform that combines an orderbook-based trading infrastructure with a robust liquidity layer. Unlike traditional exchanges, Orderly operates as a backend infrastructure, enabling developers and businesses to build powerful trading applications without starting from scratch. Its key innovation lies in merging the high performance of centralized exchanges with the principles of [...]

The post Meet Orderly Network: The Decentralized Liquidity Layer for Web3 Trading appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
Orderly Network is a DeFi platform that combines an orderbook-based trading infrastructure with a robust liquidity layer.

Unlike traditional exchanges, Orderly operates as a backend infrastructure, enabling developers and businesses to build powerful trading applications without starting from scratch. Its key innovation lies in merging the high performance of centralized exchanges with the principles of decentralization, offering on-chain settlements and self-custody of assets.

Orderly’s DEX white-label solution allows builders to create trading platforms efficiently, accessing pre-established liquidity and professional-grade infrastructure.

The platform’s vision extends to creating an omnichain protocol, aiming to seamlessly connect traders across different blockchain networks within a single orderbook.

Orderly Network’s Core Components

Orderly Network’s architecture is built on three fundamental components that work in harmony to create a powerful and efficient trading environment.

The first is its unified trading infrastructure, which ingeniously combines the benefits of centralized and decentralized exchanges. This infrastructure enables high-performance trading across different blockchain networks while maintaining the principles of decentralization, setting a new standard for cross-chain interactions.

The second core component is Orderly Network’s robust liquidity layer for both spot and perpetual futures markets. By aggregating liquidity from various sources, including professional market makers, this layer ensures efficient trade execution with minimal slippage.

The support for both spot and perpetual futures markets within the same ecosystem allows traders to implement more sophisticated strategies and manage their risk more effectively.

The third pillar of Orderly Network’s architecture is its orderbook-based system. Unlike many decentralized exchanges that use automated market makers, Orderly Network opts for a more traditional orderbook model, offering greater transparency and enabling advanced order types such as limit orders and stop-loss orders.

What sets this system apart is its implementation in a decentralized context: while the orderbook is maintained off-chain for performance reasons, all settlements occur on-chain, ensuring both speed and security.

Getting Started with Orderly Network

Getting started with Orderly Network involves a few key steps, tailored to your role in the DeFi ecosystem.

For end-users, the journey begins by connecting with one of Orderly’s partner platforms or applications that have integrated Orderly’s infrastructure.

These could be decentralized exchanges, wallets, or trading applications built on top of Orderly. You’ll typically need to connect your Web3 wallet, such as MetaMask, to the chosen platform.

Once connected, you can start trading or using the services offered by that particular application, benefiting from Orderly’s deep liquidity and efficient orderbook system.

For developers and businesses looking to build on Orderly, the process involves engaging with Orderly’s documentation and development tools. Orderly provides comprehensive APIs and SDKs that allow for seamless integration of its trading infrastructure into new or existing applications.

This might involve setting up a developer account, obtaining necessary API keys, and familiarizing yourself with Orderly’s architecture and protocols. It’s important to note that Orderly Network itself doesn’t have a direct user interface; instead, it powers the trading experiences on partner platforms.

The $ORDER Token

The $ORDER token is the lifeblood of the Orderly Network ecosystem, designed to align the interests of various stakeholders and drive the platform’s growth and decentralization.

As an ERC-20 token on Ethereum and an Omnichain Fungible Token (OFT) on other chains, $ORDER serves multiple crucial functions within the network.

Primarily, it acts as a governance token, allowing holders to participate in key decisions about the platform’s future through a decentralized governance process.

Staking $ORDER tokens generates VALOR, which represents a user’s stake in terms of amount and duration, entitling them to a share of the protocol treasury.

For traders, staking $ORDER boosts their trading rewards, while market makers can increase their share of market-making rewards through staking.

The token’s utility extends to various aspects of the Orderly ecosystem, including potential use in upcoming products and third-party DeFi protocols.

With a maximum supply of 1 billion tokens, $ORDER’s distribution is carefully structured to support long-term growth, with allocations for community incentives, strategic investors, team members, and ecosystem development.

Users can acquire $ORDER through various means, including participation in trading activities on Orderly-powered platforms, contribution to liquidity provision, or through secondary markets once the token is publicly traded.

Trading on Orderly Network

Trading on Orderly Network offers a unique blend of centralized exchange performance with decentralized finance principles. At the heart of Orderly’s trading system is its orderbook, which aggregates liquidity from various sources to ensure deep markets and efficient price discovery.

Unlike many DeFi platforms that use automated market makers, Orderly’s orderbook allows for limit orders, market orders, and even advanced order types like stop-loss and take-profit orders, giving traders greater control over their positions.

The platform supports both spot trading for direct asset exchanges and perpetual futures for leveraged trading, catering to a wide range of trading strategies.

One of Orderly’s standout features is its gasless trading mechanism, where users can execute trades without paying blockchain transaction fees for each order, significantly reducing costs for active traders.

This is achieved through a layer-2 solution that batches transactions off-chain while ensuring final settlements occur on-chain for security.

Orderly also introduces cross-chain trading capabilities, allowing users to trade assets across different blockchain networks seamlessly within the same orderbook.

When it comes to fees, Orderly employs a maker-taker fee model, often offering rebates to market makers to encourage liquidity provision. Traders can potentially reduce their fees by staking $ORDER tokens, adding another layer of utility to the native token.

Rewards and Incentives

Orderly Network has implemented a comprehensive rewards and incentives program to encourage participation and foster ecosystem growth.

At the forefront is the trading rewards program, which allocates 15% of the total $ORDER token supply to users trading on Orderly-powered platforms.

This program operates on an epoch basis, with rewards distributed over approximately 200 epochs, each lasting 14 days. The reward structure is designed to incentivize long-term engagement, with higher rewards in the initial bootstrapping phase gradually tapering off in later epochs.

Alongside trading rewards, Orderly offers a market making rewards program, allocating 10% of the total $ORDER supply to liquidity providers.

This program aims to ensure deep, consistent liquidity across all trading pairs. Both trading and market making rewards are calculated based on a combination of trading volume and $ORDER token staking, encouraging users to not only actively trade but also hold and stake the platform’s native token.

In recognition of early supporters, Orderly has allocated 13.3% of the total $ORDER supply for a retroactive airdrop.

This airdrop rewards early adopters on both EVM and NEAR chains, as well as participants in social campaigns and long-term incentive programs.

The rewards system extends beyond token distribution, with fee discounts offered to high-volume traders and enhanced rewards for those staking larger amounts of $ORDER.

Security and Self-Custody

Security and self-custody are paramount principles in Orderly Network’s architecture, blending the robustness of decentralized systems with the performance of centralized exchanges.

At its core, Orderly Network upholds the ethos of “not your keys, not your coins” by ensuring that users retain full custody of their assets at all times. This is achieved through a sophisticated system where users’ funds remain in their own wallets or smart contracts, only moving to trading contracts when actively participating in trades.

The platform utilizes advanced cryptographic techniques and secure multi-party computation to enable fast, off-chain order matching while maintaining on-chain settlement for all transactions. This hybrid approach allows for high-speed trading without compromising on security.

Orderly Network also implements a comprehensive set of security measures, including regular smart contract audits, bug bounty programs, and multi-signature wallets for protocol-owned assets.

To enhance user security, the platform offers features like customizable trading limits and optional two-factor authentication for critical operations. In the event of any security breaches, Orderly has established incident response protocols and maintains insurance coverage to protect users’ assets.

Future Developments

Orderly Network’s vision extends far beyond its current capabilities, with ambitious plans to revolutionize the decentralized finance landscape.

At the forefront of these developments is the platform’s push towards becoming a true omnichain protocol. This initiative aims to seamlessly connect traders from both EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) and non-EVM chains within a single, unified orderbook.

Such integration would eliminate the need for complex bridging processes, allowing users to deposit funds from any supported chain and trade effortlessly across multiple networks.

Orderly is also focusing on expanding its suite of financial products, with plans to introduce more sophisticated trading instruments like options and structured products. These additions will cater to advanced traders and institutions, potentially attracting more liquidity to the platform.

On the technical front, Orderly is continuously working on improving its layer-2 scaling solutions to enhance transaction speeds and reduce costs further.

The team is exploring cutting-edge technologies like zero-knowledge proofs to bolster privacy and security while maintaining transparency. Community engagement remains a priority, with plans to introduce more governance features and incentives for long-term token holders.

Conclusion

Orderly Network represents a significant leap forward in decentralized finance, bridging the gap between centralized exchange performance and decentralized principles.

Its unified trading infrastructure, deep liquidity pool, and orderbook-based system cater to a wide range of market participants, from individual traders to institutions.

Key features like gasless trading, cross-chain functionality, and the $ORDER token ecosystem set Orderly apart in the DeFi landscape.

The platform’s commitment to security, self-custody, and community governance ensures a truly decentralized experience.

The post Meet Orderly Network: The Decentralized Liquidity Layer for Web3 Trading appeared first on Blockonomi.

item.title: Best Cryptocurrency Loyalty Programs: Top 5 Options for 2024
item.dc:creator: Oliver Dale
item.description:
Crypto loyalty programs are starting to become more popular to retain users and have also become more sophisticated, offering a lots of different rewards and ways to earn extra crypto in the hope of sparking customer loyalty in an increasingly crowded market. From NFT-based incentives to tiered reward systems, crypto platforms are pulling out all [...]

The post Best Cryptocurrency Loyalty Programs: Top 5 Options for 2024 appeared first on Blockonomi.
item.content:encoded:
Crypto loyalty programs are starting to become more popular to retain users and have also become more sophisticated, offering a lots of different rewards and ways to earn extra crypto in the hope of sparking customer loyalty in an increasingly crowded market.

From NFT-based incentives to tiered reward systems, crypto platforms are pulling out all the stops to create engaging, value-driven experiences for their users.

In this guide we look at the top crypto loyalty programs available currently, and see what sets them apart in terms of innovation, user engagement, rewards, and accessibility.

Whether you’re a daily trader, a long-term hodler, or simply crypto-curious, understanding these programs could help you save money, make money and more.

Let’s take a look….

What are Cryptocurrency Loyalty Programs?

Cryptocurrency loyalty programs are incentive schemes designed by digital asset platforms to reward and retain their users. These programs aim to encourage ongoing engagement, increase platform usage, and foster a sense of community among participants.

Unlike traditional loyalty programs that might offer points or cash back, crypto loyalty programs often leverage blockchain technology and digital assets to provide unique, crypto-centric rewards.

These programs typically feature token rewards, tiered membership systems, and exclusive access to platform features or events. Many offer fee discounts for regular users and incorporate staking mechanisms to earn additional rewards.

Gamification elements are often included to make participation more engaging, while some programs focus on education, rewarding users for learning about cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology.

Increasingly, platforms are integrating NFTs into their loyalty schemes and offering community governance features. Referral bonuses are common, incentivizing users to bring new members to the platform.

For users, these programs provide additional value beyond basic cryptocurrency trading or holding.

For platforms, they help increase user retention, boost trading volumes, and create a more engaged user base. As the cryptocurrency market matures, these loyalty programs continue to evolve, becoming more sophisticated and tailored to user preferences, playing a crucial role in differentiating platforms in a crowded market.

Our Criteria for Choosing

When selecting the best crypto loyalty programs, we looked at four key criteria to ensure we are showcasing the most innovative and user-friendly programs in the market:

  1. Innovation and uniqueness: We assessed how each program stands out from the competition and offers unique rewards or benefits to its users.
  2. User engagement and community feedback: We considered the level of engagement within the community and how satisfied users are with the program.
  3. Rewards and benefits offered: We evaluated the types of rewards and benefits users can earn through the loyalty program.
  4. Ease of participation and accessibility: We looked at how easy it is for users to participate in the program and access their rewards.

Top 5 Cryptocurrency Loyalty Programs

1. SwapSpace Invaders Club NFT Loyalty Program

  • Innovative feature: SwapSpace offers an enticing loyalty program centered around NFTs. By using the Invader NFT during exchanges, users can easily receive cashback from RevShare. Customizable NFTs allow users to find their Invader’s unique style using scenes, skins, and exclusive accessories from the store.
  • User engagement: SwapSpace boasts a dedicated fan base that actively participates in the loyalty program and utilizes the platform’s services. In total, more than 4,300 NFTs were minted. Within two weeks of the launch, over 500 active users are actively participating in the loyalty program.
  • Rewards: Users can enjoy up to 50% cashback and level up by making exchanges and completing tasks.
  • Accessibility: The Personal Account feature allows users to track their exchange history and request payments at any time with 24/7 support.

Visit

2. Binance Rewards Program

  • Innovative feature: Binance offers a tiered loyalty program based on Binance Points.
  • User engagement: The Binance community is highly engaged, with users actively participating in trading competitions and other events.
  • Rewards: Users can accumulate Points through tasks, campaigns, games, and point-based activities in the Rewards Hub. Points can be redeemed for rewards like Binance Vouchers, Gift Cards, game turns, non-profit donations, and more.
  • Accessibility: Participation in the Binance loyalty program is seamless for existing platform users.

Visit

3. Coinbase Earn

  • Innovative feature: Earn up to 9% APY (annual percentage yield) on your crypto assets and put them to work to earn rewards.
  • User engagement: Coinbase has a large user base, and the Earn program has received positive feedback.
  • Rewards: Users get rewarded for helping blockchain networks verify routine transactions in exchange for a small tradeoff in liquidity.
  • Accessibility: Participation in Coinbase is open to all exchange users, making it easy for beginners to get started.

Visit

4. Crypto.com Rewards+

  • Innovative feature: crypto.com offers a multi-tiered loyalty program, allowing users to get up to 8% back in CRON when using the Crypto.com Visa Card.
  • User engagement: crypto.com has a dedicated fan base that actively participates in the loyalty program and uses the platform’s services.
  • Rewards: Users can earn up to 10% p.a. on stablecoins, up to 8% back in CRON with Visa Card, and up to a US$200 bonus for each referral, with no limits.
  • Accessibility: Participation in the Crypto.com loyalty program is open to all platform users, with clear guidelines on tier progression.

Visit

5. KuCoin Rewards Hub

  • Innovative feature: First Trade Reward offers users USDT rewards for completing their first trade in any amount, including spot, futures, margin, and bot trades.
  • User engagement: KuCoin has a vibrant community actively providing liquidity to various token pairs.
  • Rewards: Completing the Getting Started tasks earns users cryptocurrency rewards and coupons, which can be claimed upon signing up. Cryptocurrency rewards can be withdrawn once all tasks are completed, subject to platform approval and a processing time of 15 business days.
  • Accessibility: KuCoin’s user-friendly interface and transparent bonus system have made it popular among active traders and investors.

Visit

Comparative analysis of the programs

Each of the programs on our list offers unique features and benefits to users, catering to a wide range of preferences and interests.

  • SwapSpace Invaders Club is distinguished by its focus on rewards and community engagement, providing users with a new way to earn and collect digital assets.
  • Binance Rewards program is notable for offering a wide range of benefits, discounts, and privileges to users who own Binance Points, which attracts traders and investors who are looking for incentives to remain loyal to the platform.
  • Coinbase Earn program allows users to generate passive income through an Annual Percentage Yield (APY), providing a straightforward way for users to grow their crypto assets over time.
  • Crypto.com’s Rewards+ set itself apart by offering exclusive investment opportunities and cashback rewards, appealing to users looking for diverse avenues to earn and expand their crypto holdings.
  • KuCoin Rewards Hub is particularly attractive to active traders, thanks to its enticing offerings and bonuses tailored to meet the needs and preferences of this specific user group.

Conclusion

The cryptocurrency landscape in 2024 offers a diverse array of loyalty programs, each with its own unique appeal.

From SwapSpace’s innovative NFT-based rewards to Binance’s comprehensive points system, Coinbase’s  earning approach, Crypto.com’s tiered benefits, and KuCoin’s trader-focused incentives, there’s something for every type of crypto user.

These programs demonstrate the industry’s commitment to user engagement and retention through innovative reward structures. They not only incentivize platform usage but also educate users and foster community growth.

As crypto matures, we can expect these loyalty programs to evolve further as companies battle to gain and retain loyal users.

FAQs

What are cryptocurrency loyalty programs?

Cryptocurrency loyalty programs are incentive schemes offered by crypto platforms to reward users for their engagement, loyalty, and participation in various activities. These programs typically offer benefits such as token rewards, discounted fees, exclusive promotions, and enhanced user experiences.

How do I join a cryptocurrency loyalty program?

Most loyalty programs are automatically available to users of the respective platforms. To join, you typically need to create an account on the platform and start participating in its activities. Some programs may require you to opt-in or meet certain criteria to access higher tiers of rewards.

Are these loyalty programs free to join?

Generally, joining these loyalty programs is free. However, some higher-tier rewards may require maintaining a certain balance or trading volume on the platform.

Can I participate in multiple loyalty programs simultaneously?

Yes, you can participate in multiple loyalty programs across different platforms. There are no restrictions on being a member of various programs at the same time.

How safe are these loyalty programs?

While the programs themselves are generally safe, it’s important to remember that they are tied to cryptocurrency platforms, which carry inherent risks. Always practice good security habits, such as using strong passwords and two-factor authentication.

Do I need to pay taxes on rewards earned from these programs?

Tax implications can vary depending on your country and the specific nature of the rewards. In many jurisdictions, rewards earned may be considered taxable income. It’s advisable to consult with a tax professional for guidance specific to your situation.

Can the rewards earned be withdrawn or transferred to other platforms?

This depends on the specific program and the type of rewards. Some rewards, like tokens or cryptocurrencies, can often be withdrawn or transferred. Others, like platform-specific points or discounts, may only be usable within the platform that issued them.

How often do these loyalty programs update their offerings?

Cryptocurrency platforms frequently update their loyalty programs to remain competitive and attractive to users. It’s a good idea to regularly check the terms and conditions of the programs you’re participating in to stay informed about any changes or new opportunities.

The post Best Cryptocurrency Loyalty Programs: Top 5 Options for 2024 appeared first on Blockonomi.
